alert.note: Alert for Oconee Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Oconee County through 100 PM EDT... At 1229 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Walhalla, or near Oconee State Park, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oconee State Park and Mountain Rest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
